COMMENTS: This inventory includes landslides triggered by a sequence of earthquakes rather than a single mainshock.
REFERENCES: Gorum, T., Korup, O., van Westen, C.J., van der Meijde, M., Xu, C., and van der Meer, F.D., 2014, Why so few? Landslides triggered by the 2002 Denali earthquake, Alaska: Quaternary Science Reviews, v. 95, p. 80-94, doi: 10.1016/j.quascirev.2014.04.032.
